entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: W 34 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
